attributes.action: cancel plans for the sharing of the telelvision license fee!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC could be made to share part of the television licence fee with commercial rivals under government plans to be announced later.

This is stupid, would you share your money with rival companies.. I don't think so.

Why should we fund other channels that don't offer quality programs and raise more than enough money through advertisements.

If they can't fund themselves then they should fold and not expect us to bail them out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
